Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2013 05:20PM iamever wrote: I cannot tell you how much your post meant to me! I was dx with stage 4 bc with lung mets one week ago and felt like I should go headstone shopping. I am still in a fog but your post was like a ray of sunshine and a huge dose of hope. Thank you so very much.
Posts.Title: Here I am, 6 years on. Moiralf aic
